fn.p: Edited by William H. Schlesinger, Earth and Ocean Sciences, Nicholas School of the Environment, Duke University, Durham, NC, and approved January 29, 2018 (received for review November 14, 2017)

Author contributions: A.D.M., D.M.L., and C.K. designed research; A.D.M., D.M.L., C.K., J.S.C., E.B., G.C., E.J., A.H.M., S.M., D.N., S.P., A.R., P.C., I.G., D.J.H., D.J., G.K., J.C.M., V.R., K.S., and Q.Z. performed research; A.D.M. and J.S.C. analyzed data; and A.D.M., D.M.L., C.K., J.S.C., E.B., G.C., E.J., A.H.M., S.M., D.N., S.P., A.R., P.C., I.G., D.J.H., D.J., G.K., J.C.M., V.R., C.S., K.S., E.A.G.S., and Q.Z. wrote the paper.
